meanings.definition: The quality of requiring a lot of effort
meanings.sent1: Her painting showed great effortfulness in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The construction of the bridge displayed a high level of effortfulness.
meanings.sent3: Despite the effortfulness of the task, she completed it with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The effortfulness of his training was like climbing a steep mountain.
meanings.sent5: The effortfulness of the puzzle made it satisfying to solve.

meanings.definition: The state of being difficult or laborious
meanings.sent1: The effortfulness of the project made it challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: She felt the effortfulness of the journey as she climbed the steep hill.
meanings.sent3: The effortfulness of the situation made them appreciate the outcome even more.
meanings.sent4: The effortfulness of the decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The effortfulness of the task made her feel accomplished when it was done.

meanings.definition: The act of putting in hard work or exertion
meanings.sent1: His effortfulness in training paid off during the competition.
meanings.sent2: The effortfulness of her dedication was evident in her success.
meanings.sent3: The effortfulness of his dance moves brought smiles to everyone watching.
meanings.sent4: She approached her studies with the effortfulness of a dedicated scholar.
meanings.sent5: The effortfulness of their teamwork led to a victorious outcome.
